lines.text: You can't start a bonfire and then say night night.

[talking to Sarah while she is in the university swimming pool after hours]
You are the most mysterious, beautiful, angry person I have ever met. I am falling in l...
[Sarah quickly backs away from the pool ledge, clearly uneasy]
Sarah... Sarah! I am falling... into the pool with you!
[falls forward into pool]
Do you think there's someplace where we can meet that's not in silence and not in sound?
[Translating Sarah's sign language]
Sex was always something I could do as well as hearing girls. Better.
I can't ever get close enough. Say my name, just once, say my name.

[at the end of the school year, James encounters deaf student William who has a tendency to use his newly-developed speech skills for profanity]
Language skills can be dangerous, so use a little common sense. So long, William.
So long, fuck-face!
Speak to me!

[screams]
Here you go! Hear my words! Hear my voice! Ah, you want more than that? I'm gonna scream!
Hi. I'm James Leeds. My signing is rusty so how many of you can read lips?
[after a moment of silence]
No one? OK. Class dismissed!
[Everybody leaves the class]
No, no, no, no. Just testing, sit down. Lydia and Tony, good lip-readers.
[to Johnny]
Do you mind closing your notebook?
Yelling at the back of a deaf person, very good James.
[first lines]
This is the most amazing résumé I've ever seen.
I've been with some really good schools. The best.
All of them. All of the best. One right after another. You've also been with the Lucky Erin Bar and Grill.
Pittsburgh. Bartender.
And a disc jockey.
Yeah, that was in Oklahoma. I used to broadcast in sign language.
You've covered all the map, Mr. Leeds.
I've got a lot of energy.
I'm sure you do have a lot of energy and a lot of new ideas. I did too when...
[signing like a long time ago]
But nobody's trying to change the world around here. Just trying to help a few deaf kids get along a little better. But that's all. Everything else is razzle-dazzle. Am I making myself clear?
Yes, I believe that are you.
